text:
@BillNeelyNBC @coronavirus Try doing maths at least.
I don't disagree the level of testing has a huge effect on the results.
Same with death rates.
How come China us do clear now?
How come Italy has 10% death rate USA 1%???
But 7000*7 = 49000. That's nearer 20 times less than 20...
